data.name: Alone in the Office
data.detailed_description:
Alone in the office is first person survival horror game. You will need to sign documents, keep an eye on the lights and make sure they always turn on. And you will need to evade the monster that will be hunting you. You will need to use smartphone and flashlight smartly to able to survive the night.



You will play as office worker who was left to finish the tasks. While working on last documents you starting hearing strange sounds. How could this be? You are pretty sure that you are alone in the office. All people who work in the office already left. You decide to check what's happening. After going around the office, you didn't find anything suspicious and went back to work. After some time the lights suddenly went out. А creeping sound starting coming closer and closer to you. Shivers runing over your body, you are clenching your smartphone, waiting, god knows what. The night begins.

data.short_description: You will play as office worker who was left to finish the job. While working on last documents you starting hearing strange sounds. How could this be? You are pretty sure that you are alone in the office.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
